entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 10:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: SE 42 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm inland. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
